summary.span: 表示具有内容的弹出窗口。

span.span: Represents a pop-up window that has content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **内容模型**： 有一个内容属性： 。**Content Model**: has one content property: . 一个 最多只能有一个子元素，可以是任何 。A can have a maximum of one child, which can be any . 下图显示了一个 控件，该控件 其父项。The following illustration shows a control that has a as its parent. ![弹出窗口](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "Popup 图")![Popup illustration](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "Popup illustration") 可以通过设置 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 属性来定位弹出窗口。You can position a popup by setting the , , , , and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). 当屏幕上显示 时，如果重新定位其父项，则不会重新定位。When is displayed on the screen, it does not reposition itself if its parent is repositioned. 在屏幕上自己的窗口中显示其内容。A displays its content in its own window on the screen. 当 属性设置为 "`true`，并且应用程序以完全信任模式运行时， 控件支持动画。A control supports animation when the property is set to `true` and the application is running with full trust. 以完全信任级别运行的应用程序具有对系统资源的完全访问权限，并且通常安装在用户的系统上。An application that is running with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the user's system. 有关详细信息，请参阅[安全性（WPF）](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md). 若要在 的内容上显示位图和不透明度效果，必须直接对 内容设置效果。For bitmap and opacity effects to appear on the content of a , you must set the effects directly on the content. 的内容不会继承在 控件上或在父窗口中的任何其他元素上设置的效果。The content of a does not inherit effects that are set on the control or on any other element that is in the parent window. 默认情况下， 大小设置为其内容。A is sized to its content by default. 出现这种情况时，应用 或位图效果可能会导致 被遮住。When this occurs, applying a or bitmap effects may cause the to be obscured. 出现这种情况的原因是，内容的默认大小没有为要显示的效果提供足够的区域。This occurs because the default size of the content does not provide enough area for the effects to display. 如果需要更多空间，可以在 内容周围定义边距，以增加可用于控件的区域。If more space is required, you can define a margin around the content to increase the area that is available to the control. 属性必须在 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]中使用时设置。The property must be set on the when used in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]. 若要创建工具提示，请使用 和 类。To create a tooltip, use the and classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ToolTip 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-overview.md)。For more information, see [ToolTip Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 控件。The following example shows how to create a control. [!code-xaml[PopupSimple#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSimple/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-csharp[PopupSimple#CreatePopup](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSimple/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#createpopup)] [!code-vb[PopupSimple#CreatePopup](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSimple/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#createpopup)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowsTransparency { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowsTransparency : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示 控件是否可以包含透明的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a control can contain transparent content.

value.span: 如果 控件可以包含透明内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control can contain transparent content; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序以完全信任级别运行时， 控件只能包含透明内容。A control can only contain transparent content when the application runs with full trust. 以完全信任级别运行的应用程序具有对系统资源的完全访问权限，并且通常安装在本地系统上。An application that runs with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the local system. 有关详细信息，请参阅[安全性（WPF）](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md). 当 承载于 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]中时，不能将此属性设置为 `true`。This property cannot be set to `true` when the is hosted in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]. 如果在不在完全信任环境中运行的应用程序中将 属性设置为 `true`，则 属性值将更改为 `false`。If the property is set to `true` in an application that does not run in full trust, the property value is changed to `false`. 在浏览器中承载的应用程序是不以完全信任模式运行的应用程序的一个示例。An application that is hosted in a browser is an example of an application that does not run in full trust. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 控件上的 属性。The following example shows how to set the property on a control. [!code-csharp[PopupSnips#AllowsTransparency](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml.cs#allowstransparency)] [!code-vb[PopupSnips#AllowsTransparency](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#allowstransparency)] [!code-xaml[PopupSnips#AllowsTransparency](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml#allowstransparency)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of the control.

value.span: 控件的 内容。

span.span: The content of the control.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks **内容模型**： 属性是 控件的唯一内容属性。**Content Model**: The property is the only content property for the control. 只能有一个 为子，但该子元素可以包含复杂的嵌入内容。A can only have one as a child, but that child can contain complex embedded content. 例如，子元素可以是包含 、文本和其他类型的控件的 。For example, the child can be a that contains an , text, and other types of controls. 向 控件添加内容时， 控件成为内容的逻辑父级。When content is added to a control, the control becomes the logical parent to the content. 同样， 内容被视为 的逻辑子级。Similarly, the content is considered to be the logical child of the . 子内容不会添加到包含 控件的可视化树中。The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the control. 相反，当 设置为 `true`时，子内容将呈现在一个单独的窗口中，并具有自己的可视化树。Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window with its own visual tree when the is set to `true`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何向 控件添加内容。The following example shows how to add content to a control. [!code-csharp[PopupSnips#Child](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml.cs#child)] [!code-vb[PopupSnips#Child](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#child)] [!code-xaml[PopupSnips#Child](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml#child)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可能想要创建一个自定义控件，该控件具有与现有控件相同的功能，同时还展示了 的行为。You might want to create a custom control that has the same functionality as an existing control and also exhibits the behavior of a . 可以通过将 添加到控件并调用 方法，使控件的行为类似于 。You can make your control behave like a by adding a to your control and calling the method. 此方法将 `child` 分配给子属性，并将以下属性绑定到 `child`。This method assigns `child` to the child property and binds the following properties to `child`. - - - - - - - - 你应在控件中将它们作为依赖项属性实现，以便可以使用与 相同的方式。You should implement these as dependency properties in your control so it can be used the same way as a . 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义依赖属性](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/custom-dependency-properties.md)。For more information, see [Custom Dependency Properties](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/custom-dependency-properties.md). 调用 时，`child` 不能是 的子级。When you call , `child` cannot be a child of a . 此外，在调用此方法之前，应在控件上设置 `PlacementTarget`。Also, `PlacementTarget` should be set on your control before you call this method.

summary.span: 获取或设置目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的水平距离。

span.span: Get or sets the horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的水平距离。

span.span: The horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 有关目标原点和 popup 对齐点的信息，请参阅[Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

span.span: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 属性来定位弹出窗口。You can position a popup by setting the , , , , and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `double` 值的字符串表示形式。A string representation of a value. 这被解释为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 度量。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字符串不必显式包含小数点。Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points. 例如，`1` 的值是可接受的。For example, a value of `1` is acceptable. 与本主题的属性值部分中提到的限制相同 范围限制。The same range restrictions apply as those that are mentioned in the Property Value section of this topic. `qualifiedDouble` 此表前面所述的 `double` 值，后跟以下单元声明字符串之一： `px`、`in`、`cm`或 `pt`。A `double` value as described earlier in this table, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, or `pt`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = 96px`in` is inches; 1in=96px `cm` 是厘米;1cm = （96/2.54） px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm=(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = （96/72） px`pt` is points; 1pt=(96/72) px ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并将 和 属性设置为20。The following example creates a and sets the and properties to 20. 属性设置为 （这是默认值），因此目标原点是目标区域的左下角，popup 对齐点是 的左上角。The property is set to (which is the default), so the target origin is the bottom left corner of the target area and the popup alignment point is the top left corner of the . [!code-xaml[PopupPositionSnippet#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupPositionSnippet/CS/Window1.xaml#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向 控件添加内容时， 控件成为内容的逻辑父级。When you add content to a control, the control becomes the logical parent to the content. 同样， 内容被视为 的逻辑子级。Similarly, the content is considered to be the logical child of the . 子内容不会添加到包含 控件的可视化树中。The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the control. 相反，当 属性设置为 `true`时，子内容将呈现在一个单独的窗口中，该窗口具有自己的可视化树。Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window that has its own visual tree when the property is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::PlacementMode Placement { System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::PlacementMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::PlacementMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件打开时的控件方向，并指定 控件在与屏幕边界重叠时的控件行为。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation of the control when the control opens, and specifies the behavior of the control when it overlaps screen boundaries.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定 控件打开时的控件方向，并指定该控件与屏幕边界交互的方式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the orientation of the control when the control opens, and that specifies how the control interacts with screen boundaries.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 属性来定位弹出窗口。You can position a popup by setting the , , , , and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). 如果 `true` 属性，则将 设置为 或 反转 的位置;将 设置为的 将其左边缘与 的右边缘对齐，而 设置为 并将其右边缘与 的左边缘对齐。If the property is `true`, setting to or reverses the position of the ; a with set to aligns its left edge with the right edge of and a with set to aligns its right edge with the left edge of . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例创建了与某个图像相关的四个 控件。The following example creates four controls that are relative to an image. 对于 "位置" 属性，每个 都有不同的值。Each has a different value for the placement property. [!code-xaml[PopupPositionSnippet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupPositionSnippet/CS/Window1.xaml#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的打开和关闭动画。

span.span: Gets or sets an animation for the opening and closing of a control.

value.span: 枚举值，该值定义打开和关闭 控件的动画。

span.span: The enumeration value that defines an animation to open and close a control.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能在将 属性设置为 `true`时进行动画处理。A can only animate when the property is set to `true`. 这需要创建 控件的应用程序以完全信任的方式运行。This requires the application that creates the control to run with full trust. 如果 进行了动画处理，则将不会对 进行动画处理。If the is animated, the will not be animated. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StaysOpen { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.StaysOpen : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当 控件焦点不再对准时，是否关闭该控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control closes when the control is no longer in focus.

value.span: 如果在 属性设置为 时关闭 控件，则为 ；如果在 控件外发生鼠标或键盘事件时关闭 控件，则为 。

span.span: if the control closes when property is set to ; if the control closes when a mouse or keyboard event occurs outside the control.

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为 `true`时， 将 属性设置为 `false`，以将其显式关闭，以保持打开状态。When the property is set to `true`, stays open until it is explicitly closed by setting the property to `false`. `false` 时， 控件将截获所有鼠标和键盘事件，以确定这些事件中的一个发生在 控件外。When is `false`, the control intercepts all mouse and keyboard events to determine when one of these events occurs outside the control. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[PopupSnips#StaysOpen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml.cs#staysopen)] [!code-vb[PopupSnips#StaysOpen](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#staysopen)] [!code-xaml[PopupSnips#StaysOpen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSnips/Csharp/Window1.xaml#staysopen)]

summary.span: 获取或设置目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的垂直距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的垂直距离。

span.span: The vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 有关目标原点和 popup 对齐点的信息，请参阅[Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

span.span: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 属性来定位弹出窗口。You can position a popup by setting the , , , , and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md). ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `double` 值的字符串表示形式。A string representation of a value. 这被解释为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 度量。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字符串不必显式包含小数点。Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points. 例如，`1` 的值是可接受的。For example, a value of `1` is acceptable. 与本主题的属性值部分中提到的限制相同 范围限制。The same range restrictions apply as those that are mentioned in the Property Value section of this topic. `qualifiedDouble` 此表前面所述的 `double` 值，后跟以下单元声明字符串之一： `px`、`in`、`cm`或 `pt`。A `double` value as described earlier in this table, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, or `pt`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = 96px`in` is inches; 1in=96px `cm` 是厘米;1cm = （96/2.54） px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm=(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = （96/72） px`pt` is points; 1pt=(96/72) px ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，并将 和 属性设置为20。The following example creates a and sets the and properties to 20. 属性设置为 （这是默认值），因此目标原点是目标区域的左下角，popup 对齐点是 的左上角。The property is set to (which is the default), so the target origin is the bottom left corner of the target area, and the popup alignment point is the top left corner of the . [!code-xaml[PopupPositionSnippet#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupPositionSnippet/CS/Window1.xaml#5)]
